t: Pricing - AWS Shield - Amazon Web Services (AWS)
s: The Shield Advanced subscription includes certain AWS WAF usage for Shield protected resources at no additional cost. This includes the monthly fees for WebACLs, rules, and request fees for WebACLs with default (1,500) WCU limits. The other WAF features, such as Bot and Fraud Control or WebACL ...

t: What are AWS WAF, AWS Shield Advanced, and AWS Firewall Manager? - AWS WAF, AWS Firewall Manager, and AWS Shield Advanced
s: Use AWS WAF to monitor requests that are forwarded to your web applications and control access to your content. Use Shield Advanced to help protect against DDoS attacks. Use AWS Firewall Manager to set up your firewall rules and apply the rules automatically across accounts and resources, even ...

t: AWS Shield Advanced overview - AWS WAF, AWS Firewall Manager, and AWS Shield Advanced
s: AWS Shield Advanced is a managed service that helps you protect your application against external threats, like DDoS attacks, volumetric bots, and vulnerability exploitation attempts. For higher levels of protection against attacks, you can subscribe to AWS Shield Advanced.

t: AWS Shield Features
s: 2 weeks ago - All AWS customers benefit from the automatic protections of AWS Shield Standard at no additional charge. AWS Shield Standard defends against most common, frequently occurring network and transport layer DDoS attacks that target your website or applications.
